title: Any way to refuse the free Kayle gift?
body:
I REALLY hate Kayle and I don't want her on my account. Is there any way for a tech person to take this "free gift" off my account? Otherwise I have to reroll another account without her on it and I REALLY don't want to relevel another account because of Riot. Thanks!

Edit: You also can use a refund on it because it's a gift. Thanks for ruining my account Riot.

replies.body: When aram accounts blame riot for them abusing the system.

fyi I have a main account with all but five champs owned that I used to rank with but I don't play ranked or norms anymore. I didn't want to have to play champs I didn't like or know. I went through the trouble of leveling (not a fun process) this account so sorry but not sorry.

Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) after you've received the gift.  We can look into this for you and remove it.  Hang tight until the gifts are distributed first!
oh thanks! sorry I'm only checking now :) Will send in a ticket
If you ask them to get rid of the kayle skin, do you get a mystery skin?
